parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Middle - 3rd Person Plural
str2: To begin. Middle voice of archo; to commence.

parse: Verb - Present Infinitive Middle or Passive
str2: To pain, grieve, vex. From lupe; to distress; reflexively or passively, to be sad.
(a) I say, speak; I mean, mention, tell, (b) I call, name, especially in the pass., (c) I tell, command.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
One. (including the neuter Hen); a primary numeral; one.
A primary particle; down, in varied relations (genitive, dative or accusative) with which it is joined).
One. (including the neuter Hen); a primary numeral; one.
If not, unless, whether at all. From me and the neuter of tis; whether at all.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Nominative 1st Person Singular
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.
